sentences.sContent: There is the source of the recurring pestilence .
sentences.sContent_eng: There is the source of the recurring pestilence .
sentences.sCn: 那里是一再发生瘟疫的策源地。

sentences.sContent: They were crazed by the famine and pestilence of that bitter winter .
sentences.sContent_eng: They were crazed by the famine and pestilence of that bitter winter .
sentences.sCn: 他们被那年严冬的饥荒与瘟疫逼疯了。

synos.tran: [医]瘟疫（尤指鼠疫）；有害的事物

remMethod.val: 来自pestilen (t) (致命的； 瘟疫的) + ce → 瘟疫

words.tran: 致命的；有害的；恼人的；危害社会的
传播疾病的；有害的，毒害的；邪恶的
引起瘟疫的；瘟疫似的；讨厌的
害虫；有害之物；讨厌的人

trans.tranOther: a disease that spreads quickly and kills a lot of people
